post.body:
Ponniyin Selvan: II is a Tamil-language epic historical action adventure film directed by Mani Ratnam and produced by Madras Talkies and Lyca Productions. It is the second part of a two-part cinematic adaptation of Kalki Krishnamurthy's novel Ponniyin Selvan.

The film features an ensemble cast including Vikram, Aishwarya Rai, Jayam Ravi, Karthi, Trisha, and other notable actors. 

The film was released in April 2023 to positive reviews, with Alzahra Studio providing VFX for the production.
